tag_list: social, networks, games, facebook, cummunity, mobile, iphone, apple, appstore
overview:
Henric is Head of Studio for wooga - world of gaming. Wooga is a social games publisher based in Berlin Germany with popular titles on Facebook like Diamond Dash, Monster World, Bubble Island and Brain Buddies.

Before joining wooga Henric was the Director of Product Management at Digital Chocolate Ltd, a publisher of casual games for Facebook, iPhone and mobile phones. At Digital Chocolate Henric was managing product management at the Barcelona game studio focused on social games for Facebook. Henric has been the responsible product manager for Millionaire City (1.3MM DAU and biggest city building game on Facebook), MMA Pro Fighter (160K DAU) and some other smaller social games.Henric has also been the driving force for more than 20 mobile titles, including the sales charts topping title â€˜Brick Breaker Revolutionâ€™ and the multi-award winner mobile gaming community â€˜CafÃ© Gamesâ€™.

Prior to Digital Chocolate Henric worked for the games unit in Nokia. During his 3-year tenure at Nokia he was building the Arena gaming community as well as managing the first attempts on digital D2C distribution of games. Henric holds an MSc in Business and an MSc in Technology from the Ã…bo Akademi University in Finland.
